page.title: 07Some Children's Activities.
page.content: {BROWNIES}- 14 girls attend at present.They meet on Wednesday evenings in the Scout Hut on the Football Field.They meet other Packs for Revels,Church Services,Sport and Outdoor Activities.They follow the Brownie ideals,challenges and schemes.Many badges are gained regularly.In the annual Village May Fair they perform Maypole Dancing. {GUIDES}-formed in January 1969, now the Company has 13 guides and 2 guiders.They meet on Mondays. Over the years the Company has had 9 Queen's Guides. The girls favourite evenings are those connected in any way with food - but especially eating it ! {SCOUTS}-to start again soon. {CUBS}-This group is still in operation but only just because there are so few boys.They enjoy varied activities.
